sentences.sContent: I could only envy her that sort of easy congruity — how wonderful, it seemed, to feel in accord with what others thought of you.
sentences.sContent_eng: I could only envy her that sort of easy congruity — how wonderful, it seemed, to feel in accord with what others thought of you.
sentences.sCn: 我只能羡慕她那种简单的和谐一致——如果与别人对你的看法一致该是多么好。

trans.tranCn: 一致, 适合, 调和
